data.text: We have cancelled more flights today. See our Travel Updates page for information on what to do when your flight is cancelled. Please only contact customer service if your flight is within 72 hours. Thank you for your patience in this difficult situation. https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X https://t.co/QzuTxrh2MZ

@BeingUsual Hello! Apologies about the delay with our answer, because of corona virus we have queues in all channels at the moment. It it advisable to contact embassy regarding any visa issues//Hanna-Mari

data.text: @haks86 Hi, unfortunately we have cancelled flights to/from Chicago 29 March and 12 April 2020. More information behind this link: https://t.co/78QniYxucf   Br Henna

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @riina_raastas It take a while to remove all flights from our system, as we have so many cancellations. That's why you might still see a cancelled flight in the booking system. We will continue to fly to London with a limited schedule. We ask for your patience in this difficult situation.
@Kevin_Brns Hi Kevin, sorry for delayed reply. I checked your DM and it's look like you have got this sorted out. //Roosa
@harrimatias @LauriVeija @ArjaSuominen @TopiManner Kiitos ymmärryksestä! Takaisinmaksulomake löytyy täältä, käsittelyssä menee noin kuukausi: https://t.co/VnqI8SUcSj

urls.title: Takaisinmaksu
urls.description: Tällä lomakkeella voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lipusta tai lento-osuudesta, tai maksullisesta lisäpalvelusta kuten istuinpaikasta tai ateriasta.

data.text: @mattybridgen Please read more information about your different options here: https://t.co/78QniYxucf

We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. data.text: @harrimatias @LauriVeija @ArjaSuominen @TopiManner Hei, olen pahoillani sinulle koituneesta harmista. Tilanteet ovat tosiaan jatkuvasti eläneet viime päivinä, ja asiakaspalvelumme on nyt todella kuormittunut tämän johdosta. Onneksi kuitenkin pääsit lopulta kotiin! Heidi / Finnair

@jessietango You can’t make changes through Manage booking if you have a group booking, booked your trip through a 3rd party vendor, purchased it with a combination of money & Finnair Plus points, your flight is already cancelled or you upgraded your flight with money or tier benefit.

@LittleSatanay Hello! According to this moment´s information we are flying to Paris also in April. If you wish us to check information in your reservation kindly dm us your booking reference and contact information in your reservation so we can take a look//Hanna-Mari

data.text: @panickstrom Hei, Dublin on kokonaan peruttu 20.3. alkaen. Operoimme kuitenkin Lontooseen myös poikkeustilan aikana, eli tällä hetkellä neuvoisin palaamaan kotiin sitä kautta. Olen pahoillani hankaluuksista mitä tämä aiheuttaa. Heidi / Finnair

@ExpatMamasita Could you please get in touch with our customer service about this in a few weeks time? I know it's inconvenient to have to wait, but they are now assisting customers scheduled to fly in 72 hours. Thank you for your patience and understanding! Heidi / Finnair
@ExpatMamasita If the situation improves before June, we will ramp up our capacity sooner. Heidi / Finnair

We are making service changes to reduce direct contact between our customers and crew. 
- The in-flight meal and beverage service will be reduced
- Duty-free or pre-order shopping will not be available 
- We will close our lounges at Helsinki airport
https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

data.text: @MHotchamps Yes, we will maintain a limited service to Brussels (providing that there aren't any new restrictions). We are still maintaining routes that are considered critical for Finland, and Brussels is one of them. More info here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X Heidi / Finnair

@mattybridgen Customers will get an email/SMS, but they might come quite late as we are cancelling thousands of flights. We ask for your patience in this completely unprecedented situation. Please follow our Travel Updates for the most up to date info: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X Heidi / Finnair
@CallumJewell1 Welcome on board again when the situation is more normal - let's hope that happens soon! Heidi / Finnair
@DevonHosford Thank you for your understanding and welcome to fly with us when the situation is normal again! Heidi / Finnair
@CallumJewell1 We will still operate a limited service to London. We are maintaining connections that are considered critical for Finland. London is one of them. Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@Pooja68004340 Hi! I'm sorry to hear that and sorry for late reply. Unfortunately I'm not able to open that link, could you send your booking reference and contact details via DM? -Helmi
@MartaInIndia Hi Marta! Unfortunately yes, you can check all information from our websites. https://t.co/78QniYxucf // Helmi

data.text: We have decided to cancel our Annual General Meeting scheduled for 18 March 2020 due to the coronavirus situation. It will be held at a new date, which will be announced later. https://t.co/sAPdzfwNEU

data.text: @KajMikko Hei, tällä hetkellä meillä on pitemmät jonot. Jos et ole saanut vaihdettua sinun lentoja vielä, niin lähettäisitkö meille yksityisviestinä sinun varaustiedot, niin tarkistamme asian. //Mari

@kingmatthew46 Hi Matthew,

sorry for late reply! Here in social media have quite long answering times, so I recommend that you contact us by calling or chatting through our websites due your fligh is so close. https://t.co/oC3lkjl5HX // Helmi

data.text: We are now cancelling flights from 16 March to 30 June from our systems. These are the routes we have cancelled today. We'll publish information about more cancellations tomorrow. Read more: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X https://t.co/aisB9fQdKj
@PacoPrettyGordo Hi, please send us a DM with your booking and contact details, so that we can have a look at your reservation //Mari

@chris_waudby Hi Chris, I'm sorry to hear this. Hope that everything sorted out. Please send your booking reference, email address and phone number via DM if you still need help with your booking. //Roosa
@IamAnnicles And please send them via DM. //Roosa

@IamAnnicles Hi Anna, I'm sorry to hear this. Were you able to change your travel dates? If you still need help with your booking, please send us your booking reference, the route and original travel dates that we can take a look at your booking. //Roosa

@accentcph Hi, please send us a DM with your booking and contact details, so that we can have a look at your reservation. If your booking is made via a travel agency, then please contact them instead //Mari
@RuAviaPhotog Hi Vasily! Sorry for my delayed answer. Please read information and instructions from our travel update page: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X. /Jenni
@JenHanks Hi Jennifer! I'm sorry for delayed answer. Did you get through to our customer service ? If not, kindly send DM to us with your booking details. /Jenni

@expensivestevie Hi, I´m sorry for late reply, our services are congested at the moment due to situation with coronavirus. You can finf updated info https://t.co/78QniYxucf. If you wish us to take a look at your booking, please send your reservation code, flight details and email via DM./Jaana

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @RaefoNofeaR Hi, sorry for delayed reply. Please send your booking reference, email address and phone number via DM that we can take a look at your booking. //Roosa

@ApfelUndSo Hi Phil, If you still hasn´t been able to change your schedule, please send your reservation code, flight details and email via DM, so we can take a look. If you have travel agency booking, please contact them. /Jaana

@CeliaYarwood Hi Celia, I see that you have also sent us a DM. Our customer service can help you there as well. Please go and answer the questions there and our customer service will get back to you as soon as they can. /Krista from Finnair
@Musa_975 Hi Musa, we are currently evaluating how this affects our operations and we will inform our customers as soon as we can. /Krista form Finnair

Please make sure we have your contact details through manage booking: https://t.co/JmOKVffJcs

And read more about the current situation from here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

As the number of cancelled flights is high, we cancel the flights gradually. We are now cancelling flights from 16 March – 30 June from our systems, and we can’t cancel all flights at once. We do our best to carry customers home from our destinations in this difficult situation.
@misoraa__ Hi, I just answered to your DM. /Krista from Finnair
@Brigida53610302 We are updating there the list of cancelled flights as soon as we can. /Krista

@Brigida53610302 Hi, unfortunately, it can't be guaranteed. We announced today that we are transitioning to a limited network gradually and cancelling several flights. Please see the current information from here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X /Krista from Finnair
@bhanu_bhatnagar Hi, my apologies for delayed reply. Hope you were able to get help from other channel and the problem is solved.//Roosa
@Mifkata Hi, cant sent you dm please allow Finnair helps/Eveliina
@glowingcrazy Hi, please send your booking reference and the whole route via DM that we can take a look. //Roosa
@dranotdria Hi Alex, sorry for the late reply. If there is anything I could help you with, please send your booking details to us by DM. //Jukka-Pekka
@lani49 Hi! Please send your booking reference, route and dates via Dm? //Satu
